request-topic.description: The MQTT topic pattern for the Command request.

model-id.description: The identifier of the the service model, which is the full DTMI of the Interface.

executor-id.description: Identifier of the asset that is targeted to execute a Command.

topic-namespace.description: A leading namespace for the Command request MQTT topic pattern.

custom-token-map.description: A map from custom topic tokens to replacement values.

idempotent.description: Whether it is permissible to execute the Command multiple times for a single invocation of the Command.

cache-ttl.description: Maximum duration for which a response to a Command instance may be reused as a response to other Command instances.

execution-timeout.description: Maximum duration to permit a Command to execute before aborting the execution.

request-responses-map.description: A map from received request value to an array of response values to be used sequentially.

response-metadata.description: Keys and values for header fields to be set in the Command response; a null value should be replaced from the matching key in the Command request.

execution-concurrency.description: A limit on the count of concurrent executions to reqest from the command dispatcher.

raise-error.description: Raise an error from the Command execution function.

sync.description: A sequence of synchronization operations to perform during execution of the Command.
